bit_field_value.name: CHCFG_TRIG_DISABLED
bit_field_value.description: Triggering is disabled. If triggering is disabled and ENBL is set, the DMA Channel will simply route the specified source to the DMA channel. (Normal mode)

bit_field_value.name: CHCFG_TRIG_ENABLED
bit_field_value.description: Triggering is enabled. If triggering is enabled and ENBL is set, the DMAMUX is in Periodic Trigger mode.

bit_field_value.name: CHCFG_ENBL_DISABLED
bit_field_value.description: DMA channel is disabled. This mode is primarily used during configuration of the DMAMux. The DMA has separate channel enables/disables, which should be used to disable or reconfigure a DMA channel.

bit_field_value.name: CHCFG_ENBL_ENABLED
bit_field_value.description: DMA channel is enabled
